@@ -44,2 +44,2 @@ -# {0} is a rule name, {1} is one or more event type names -RulesToolkit_RULE_REQUIRES_EVENT_TYPE_NOT_AVAILABLE_LONG=The {0} rule requires that there are no events from the following types: {1}.

If you are using JMC to create a flight recording, then you can enable event types in the Start Flight Recording wizard. If you are using JMC to create a flight recording, then you can enable event types in the Start Flight Recording wizard. If you are starting the flight recording from the command line, then you can use the settings parameter of -XX:FlightRecorderOptions.
